node.title: 1. We Need Revival
node.description:
Revival is our greatest and most urgent need! We are told the church is now a vast hospital, filled with the spiritually sick—most of the members are spiritually dead in trespasses and sins. Yet, they believe everything is okay. Is this true? Why?
